text:
@PeteButtigieg Florida Covid-19 statistics: Total tested 3,029,149: positive-250,984-8.29%; deaths-4,197-.14% of tested: deaths-0-24 yrs.-12; 25-34 yrs.-23; 35-64 yrs.-16%; 65+yrs.-83%. White deaths-68%; Black deaths-21%. Open up everything, especially schools & colleges! 
@realDonaldTrump
